issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Create picker with Ti.UI.PICKER_TYPE_TIME.
Set time by timePicker.setValue(new Date(0, 0, 0, 12, 45)).
Time on picker will be 11:35AM for +0003.
Get time from picker by getValue(). Return value is '1899-12-31 09:45:00 +0000'.
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.3
Xcode5
iOS 7.0 Simulator
